title: ﻿क्या राहुल गांधी ने राफेल सौदे पर झूठ बोलने के लिए सुप्रीमकोर्ट से माफ़ी मांगी ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: In his reply in Supreme Court, Rahul Gandhi said "my statements were used and misused by the political opponents." and that he "gave the statements in the heat of the political campaigning." https://t.co/99p7e2N2O8
